title: Bowie: the video collection
brief_description: A wonderful collection of the innovative and ever-evolving music by British rock singer/composer, David Bowie, spanning part of his amazing career from 1972 through to 1990. Includes rare video clips and appearances by Peter Frampton, Alan Freeman, Mick Jagger and many other internationally known rock music performers. Digitally re-mastered.
